attributes.action: Dear Queen, Could This be the Black Cross?
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Queen Elizabeth

Many of us have been wondering for a long time what mysteries may be hidden behind Holyrood, since very little reliable and historical information is available that we could locate.We wondered whether a piece of the true Cross which gives the name to the area may actually exist, and where it could be.
This could indeed be the evidence that we are looking for, that the Black Rood  may indeed exist, and we are thinking of how to verify and publicise this information.
Read the full text of the petition here:
https://sites.google.com/site/rosslyncoi/the-true-cross/petition-to-the-queen?pli=1
